chargeHist.descr: Neglecting a Child (No Harm and Child < 6 Yrs or Disability)

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Emily K. Gaertner in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Toni L. Young in court for Kelly M. Kidd. Defendant Kelly M. Kidd in court. Clerk. M.Burke. Parties advise they are working on a HOA.
Plea hearing scheduled for December 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Emily K. Gaertner in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Toni L. Young in court for Kelly M. Kidd. Defendant Kelly M. Kidd in court. Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney Young states that she has not been able to get in contact with the DE but believes the issue has been figured out.
Status conference scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant, Kelly M. Kidd, appeared with Attorney Toni L. Young.  Attorney Brendaliz Valdes appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Bound over.   Information filed; reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered. Scheduling Order given to Attorney in court.  Bond continued.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on June 29, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant, Kelly M. Kidd, appeared.  Attorney Andrew Joseph Burgoyne appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
No Attorney Assigned - is eligible for SPD services - SPD has not secured representation
